otherworldorigins.disconnect.validation_: Failed to validate origin layers after multiple attempts. Please try reconnecting. If this happens repeatedly, please check your network connection.
otherworldorigins.gui.enchantment_restri: Only %s can make use of the %s enchantment
tooltip.otherworldorigins.hover_cost: Spend %s levels to reset all stats.
tooltip.otherworldorigins.hover_refund: %s%% of XP spent on stats will be refunded.
passive.otherworldorigins.magic_mana.des: Increases the amount of mana available for casting.
passive.otherworldorigins.int_spell_powe: Increases the average damage done by your spells.
otherworldorigins.tooltip.advanced_table: Requires the Legendary Smith Skill and an Underdark subrace
otherworldorigins.tooltip.basic_table_re: Requires an Underdark subrace, or the Legendary Smith skill
skill.otherworldorigins.reforging.descri: Grants access to Reforging and Gem Cutting Tables. Underdark races can learn this skill to gain access to Augmenting and Ancient Reforging.
otherworldorigins.uncastable: You can't use this ability right now.
otherworldorigins.reforge_restricted: Your lack the knowledge needed to use this table...
otherworld.message.charisma_save: You were seen committing a crime, but spared punishment thanks to your Charisma.
effect.otherworldorigins.golem_timer.des: Displays the duration remaining on your summons, and their count
effect.otherworldorigins.beast_timer.des: Displays the duration remaining on your summons, and their count
origin.origins.human.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§oNone§r

 A human's fate is more open than most - venture forth with no benefits or drawbacks.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/human.name: Human
origin.otherworldorigins.race/human.desc:
• Medium Size 
• +1 to All Stats§r
• 10% Discount from Villagers§r

§oVersatile and adaptable, perfectly prepared for the full spectrum of challenges one may face on an adventure.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/human_vari:
• Medium Size 
• +2 to Two Stats of your choice
• +1 bonus Feat of your choice
(All races can choose a Feat every 4 levels)§r

§oThere is great power in sacrifice. What you leave behind unearths who you could be.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/elf.name: Elf
origin.otherworldorigins.race/elf.descri:
• Medium Size§r
• +2 Dexterity§r
• Darkvision§r

§oElves are graceful and agile, with keen senses and a natural affinity for magic.§r

§nSubraces§r
• High Elf
• Wood Elf
• Drow
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/elf/hig:
• +1 Intelligence§r
• +1 Magic§r

§oHigh elves are wise and powerful. They are known for their intellect and magical aptitude.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/elf/woo:
• +1 Dexterity
• +1 Speed§r

§oWood elves are swift and perceptive, at home in the forests and wild lands.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/elf/dro:
• +1 Intelligence§r
• Access to Reforging§r

§oDrow, or dark elves, are known for their cunning and mastery of ancient magics.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/half_elf.d:
• Medium Size§r
• +2 Charisma§r
• +1 to Two Stats
• Darkvision§r

§oThe fabled power of Elven blood and the courageous soul of Humans. High-Elves are often natural-born diplomats.§r

§nSubraces§r
• High Half-Elf
• Wood Half-Elf
• Drow Half-Elf
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/half_el:
• +1 Intelligence§r
• +1 Cantrip§r

§oYour High-Elven ancestors were wise and powerful. You inherited some of their intellect and magical aptitude.

• +1 Dexterity
• +10% Speed§r

§oLike your Wood-Elven elders you are swift and perceptive, at home in the forests and wild lands.

• +1 Intelligence§r
• Access to Reforging§r

§oYour Drow lineage has imbued your memories with some of their esoteric knowledge.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/dwarf.name: Dwarf
origin.otherworldorigins.race/dwarf.desc:
• Small Size
• +2 Constitution
• -10% Speed
• Darkvision
• Dwarven Resilience

§oA tough and stocky race, often accompanied by the clamoring of pickaxes. §r

§nSubraces§r
• Hill Dwarf
• Mountain Dwarf
• Duergar
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/dwarf/h:
• +1 Building
• +0.5 Hearts per Level

§oHill dwarves are the most adventurous of the dwarven races - they often live above ground, and are well adapted to settling new lands.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/dwarf/m:
• +1 Strength§r
• +1 Defence§r

§oMountain dwarves are resilient and sturdy, conditioned by the rugged unforgiving snowy peaks they call home.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/dwarf/d:
• +1 Intelligence§r
• Access to Reforging§r

§oDuergar, or gray dwarves, hail from deep in the underdark - a Duergar rarely ever sees the light of day.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/halfling.d:
• Small Size
• +2 Dexterity§r
• +1 Luck
• -10% Speed

§oHalflings are nimble and lucky, with a natural talent for stealth and precision.§r

§nSubraces§r
Lightfoot Halfling
Stout Halfling
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/halflin:
• +1 Charisma§r
• +10% Speed§r

§oThey'll never know what hit them.

• +1 Constitution§r
• Poison Resistance§r

§oYou've had several lifetimes worth of stew for someone your size. This has proven to be a great asset.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/gnome.name: Gnome
origin.otherworldorigins.race/gnome.desc:
• Small Size
• +2 Intelligence
• +1 Luck
• -10% Speed
• Darkvision

§oSharp minds and wit, and hearts full of wonder. Can't reach the top shelf.§r

§nSubraces§r
Rock Gnome
Forest Gnome
Deep Gnome
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/gnome/r:
• +1 Constitution§r

§oWhere others see junk, rock gnomes see possibility. Their workshops hum with the promise of the next great invention—or spectacular explosion.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/gnome/f:
• +1 Dexterity§r

§oMasters of misdirection, forest gnomes dance through dappled shadows, their laughter echoing like wind chimes in a summer breeze.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/gnome/d:
• Access to Reforging§r

§oSilent as stone, deep gnomes carry the weight of the earth in their eyes. Their craftsmanship whispers secrets of ages long past.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/dragonborn:
• Medium Size§r
• +2 Strength
• +1 Charisma
• Draconic Ancestry
• 10% Physical Resistance

§oScaled and proud, dragonborn walk the line between mortal and myth. Their mere presence commands respect.§r

§nSubraces§r
Black, Blue, Brass, Bronze, Copper, Gold, Green, Red, Silver, White
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/dragonb:
• Acid Breath Attack§r

§oTheir words drip with sarcasm as corrosive as their breath. Swamp-dwellers beware: these dragons in mortal form feel right at home in your turf.

• Lightning Breath Attack§r

§oWith personalities as electric as their breath, blue dragonborn crackle with barely contained energy. They're shockingly good company.

• Fire Breath Attack§r

§oNever at a loss for words, brass dragonborn could talk the scales off a dragon. Their fiery breath is often preceded by equally heated debates.

• Lightning Breath Attack§r

§oNoble as their metallic namesake, bronze dragonborn stand tall against injustice. Their lightning breath is matched only by their quick wit in battle.

• Acid Breath Attack§r

§oWith a joke always on the tip of their forked tongue, copper dragonborn prove that laughter truly is the best medicine—unless you're on the receiving end of their acidic humor.

• Fire Breath Attack§r

§oRadiant in both appearance and spirit, gold dragonborn shine with inner light. Their fire breath is but a glimpse of the sun's fury given form.

• Fire Breath Attack§r

§oPassionate and fierce, red dragonborn burn with the intensity of a thousand forges. Their tempers flare as readily as their devastating breath weapon.

• Cold Breath Attack§r

§oRegal and serene, silver dragonborn move with fluid grace. Their icy breath brings winter's bite, even on the warmest summer day.

• Cold Breath Attack§r

§oHardy as the frozen tundra, white dragonborn thrive where others shiver. Their frosty demeanor hides hearts as vast and deep as glaciers.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/tiefling.d:
• Medium Size§r
• +2 Charisma§r
• +1 Intelligence§r
• Darkvision§r
• Hellish Resistance§r
• Infernal Legacy§r

§oA hint of brimstone in their wake and mischief in their eyes; Tieflings are devilishly clever.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/undead.des:
§oNeither alive nor dead, cursed to walk this world until their creator's purpose is served.§r

§nSubraces§r
Zombie
Skeleton
Wither Skeleton
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/undead/:
• Medium Size
• +1 Defense
• +Poison Resistance
• -Sun Resistance

§oSlow and steady wins the race (especially when you've got eternity to finish). Mind the sun; it's bad for your skin.

• Medium Size§r
• +1 Dexterity
• +5 Bow Damage
• -Bow Resistance

§oThe reanimated scaffolding of a humanoid, designed for only one purpose - shoot arrow.

• Tall Size§r
• +1 Strength§r
• +5 Sword Damage§r
• -Sword Resistance§r

§oBorn in the fires of the Nether, these ashen warriors emanate death wherever they walk.
origin.otherworldorigins.race/other.name: Other
origin.otherworldorigins.race/other.desc:
§oRare and unusual races; less common choices for player characters.§r

§nSubraces§r
Githyanki
Hobgoblin
Goblin
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/other/g:
• Tall Size
• Water Vulnerable
• Teleport with Ender Pearls§r
• +1 Defence§r

§oThe Githyanki are tall, slender aliens who hail from the stars; manipulating space and time comes easily to them, but they are not adapted to our world.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/other/h:
• Medium Size§r
• Gold Proficiency (Increased Gold Stats)§r
• Heat Resistance§r
• +1 Strength§r

§oWarriors by nature, with an innate hot temper, though more conscientious and resilient than their goblin relatives.
origin.otherworldorigins.subrace/other/g:
• Medium Size§r
• Gold Proficiency (Increased Gold Stats)§r
• Cold Resistance§r
• +1 Dexterity§r

§oSmall, green, and perpetually underestimated, goblins use their miniature form to great advantage. Keep an eye on your coin purse.
power.otherworldorigins.dark_vision.name: Dark Vision
power.otherworldorigins.class/bard/start: You'll begin your adventure with a lute, for serenading purposes.
power.otherworldorigins.race/half_elf/ch: §oCharisma reduces the chance you will be punished when committing a crime.
power.otherworldorigins.race/tiefling/ch: §oCharisma reduces the chance you will be punished when committing a crime.
power.otherworldorigins.subrace/halfling: §oCharisma reduces the chance you will be punished when committing a crime.
power.otherworldorigins.race/dragonborn/: §oCharisma reduces the chance you will be punished when committing a crime.
power.otherworldorigins.race/tiefling/in: §oYou can instantly cast Firebolt for 10 mana. Once you reach level 7, this ability upgrades to Fireball. At level 14, instead cast Magma Bomb for 20 mana.
power.otherworldorigins.race/dragonborn/: §oYour dragon scales grant you 10% resistance to physical weapons. You can breathe a cone of magical energy based on your ancestral heritage
power.otherworldorigins.race/undead/unde: §oAll Undead races receive inverted Healing and Harming effects, and take extra damage from the Smite enchantment
power.otherworldorigins.subrace/undead/z: §oYou'll burn in daylight - this can be negated with a helmet.
power.otherworldorigins.subrace/other/go: §oYou receive 50% extra stats from gold gear, and gold gear has 50% more durability
power.otherworldorigins.subrace/other/ho: §oYou receive 50% extra stats from gold gear, and gold gear has 50% more durability
power.otherworldorigins.subrace/other/gi: §oYou can summon and throw an ender pearl to teleport. Once you reach level 11, you can directly teleport to a target area within 64 blocks.
§oYou take damage from water and rain, but this can be offset with the Water Protection enchantment.
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/chef.name: Chef
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/chef.desc: Your Hunger and Thirst drain 25% slower.
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/defensive: When wielding a one-handed weapon, you have a 10% chance to dodge incoming attacks
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/dual_wiel: Deal 2 extra damage while holding a weapon in your off-hand
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/everybody: Receive an extra 10% discount from Villagers
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/savage_at: Deal 2 extra damage with Melee attacks
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/elemental: You are immune to Temperature effects
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/lucky.des: Once per day, reroll your Enchanting seed for free.
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/martial_a: Your Attack Speed is increased by 10%
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/mobile.de: Your Movement Speed is increased by 10%
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/polearm_m: Your melee attacks with Staffs apply a knockback effect
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/resilient: You can select +1 to any Stat
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/shield_ma: While wielding a shield in your off-hand, gain 2 extra armor
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/skilled.d: Your Jump Height is increased to 2 blocks.
origin.otherworldorigins.feats/weapon_ma: Deal 1 extra damage with any weapon

The Great Old One

origin.otherworldorigins.subclass/artifi: • Receive double the duration of potion effects
origin.otherworldorigins.subclass/barbar: • Summon a Beast for 50 mana, lasting 10 minutes. 5 minute cooldown.
origin.otherworldorigins.class/bard.name: Bard
origin.otherworldorigins.subclass/bard/l:
• 50% Reduced Negative Effect Duration
• Push Ability
origin.otherworldorigins.subclass/druid/:
• Bonus Stats at Night
• Summon a Beast for 50 mana, lasting 10 minutes. 5 minute cooldown.

• Bonus Stats while below y=0
• Summon 2 Undead for 50 mana, lasting 10 minutes. 5 minute cooldown.

• Summon a Mythic Golem for 50 mana, lasting 10 minutes. 5 minute cooldown. Only 1 Golem may be active at a time.

power.otherworldorigins.class/warlock/el: Instantly cast Magic Missile (Level 5) for 10 Mana. Once you reach level 15, cast 3 missiles in sequence for no extra cost.
origin.otherworldorigins.cantrips/acid_o: Instantly cast Acid Orb (Level 4) for 10 mana
origin.otherworldorigins.cantrips/ray_of: Instantly cast Ray of Frost (Level 2) for 10 mana
origin.otherworldorigins.cantrips/chain_: Instantly cast Chain Lightning (Level 1) for 10 mana
origin.otherworldorigins.cantrips/magic_: Instantly cast Magic Missile (Level 4) for 10 mana
origin.otherworldorigins.cantrips/two/ac: Instantly cast Acid Orb (Level 4) for 10 mana
origin.otherworldorigins.cantrips/two/ra: Instantly cast Ray of Frost (Level 2) for 10 mana
origin.otherworldorigins.cantrips/two/ch: Instantly cast Chain Lightning (Level 1) for 10 mana
origin.otherworldorigins.cantrips/two/ma: Instantly cast Magic Missile (Level 4) for 10 mana
